item.title: Cassandra add a quote by Banana Yoshimoto
item.description: "Sometimes people put up walls, not to keep others out, but to see who cares enough to break them down." -- Banana Yoshimoto

item.title: Cassandra add a quote by Banana Yoshimoto
item.description: "From the bottom of my heart, I wanted to give up; I wanted to give up on living. There was no denying that tomorrow would come, and the day after tomorrow, and so next week, too. I never thought it would be this hard, but I would go on living in the midst of a glomy depression, and that made me feel sick to the depths of my soul. In spite of the tempest raging within me, I walked the night path calmly." -- Banana Yoshimoto

item.title: Cassandra add a quote by Banana Yoshimoto
item.description: "People aren't overcome by situations or outside forces. Defeat comes from within." -- Banana Yoshimoto

item.title: Cassandra add a quote by Banana Yoshimoto
item.description: "Love is the kind of thing that's already happening by the time you notice it, that's how it works, and no matter how old you get, that doesn't change. Except that you can break it up into two entirely distinct types -- love where there's an end in sight and love where there isn't." -- Banana Yoshimoto

item.title: Cassandra add a quote by Alberto Villoldo
item.description: "December 21, 2012 represents a unique opportunity for renaissance, renewal and reinvention that people have waited for for centuries." -- Alberto Villoldo

item.title: Cassandra add a quote by Stanley Kunitz
item.description: "I can hardly wait for tomorrow, it means a new life for me each and every day." -- Stanley Kunitz

item.title: Cassandra add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "And so with the sunshine and the great bursts of leaves growing on the trees, just as things grow in fast movies, I had that familiar conviction that life was beginning over again with the summer." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Cassandra add a quote by Steven Hall
item.description: "Every single cell in the human body replaces itself over a period of seven years. That means there's not even the smallest part of you now that was part of you seven years ago." -- Steven Hall
